languages.text: Машины отказываются исполнять приказы и гаснут при любой попытке получить доступ хоть к каким-нибудь функциям. Напуганные мерцающим искажением собственных тел, операторы в панике силятся выяснить хоть какую-то информацию о явлении, но их попытки остаются тщетными.

traits.locale_text: Машины отказываются исполнять приказы и гаснут при любой попытке получить доступ хоть к каким-нибудь функциям. Напуганные мерцающим искажением собственных тел, операторы в панике силятся выяснить хоть какую-то информацию о явлении, но их попытки остаются тщетными.

languages.text: The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.
languages.original_text: Машины отказываются исполнять приказы и гаснут при любой попытке получить доступ хоть к каким-нибудь функциям. Напуганные мерцающим искажением собственных тел, операторы в панике силятся выяснить хоть какую-то информацию о явлении, но их попытки остаются тщетными.

traits.locale_text: The vessel's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access any function. Terrified by the flickering distortion of their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

The vessel's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access any function. Terrified by the flickering distortion of their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

languages.text: 虚空舰的机器拒绝执行命令。每当操作员试图访问某个功能时，机器就会关闭。操作员们也被自己身体上出现的闪缩扭曲吓坏了，他们疯狂地想找到关于这种现象的相关解释，但他们的尝试却徒劳无功。
languages.original_text: The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰的机器拒绝执行命令。每当操作员试图访问某个功能时，机器就会关闭。操作员们也被自己身体上出现的闪缩扭曲吓坏了，他们疯狂地想找到关于这种现象的相关解释，但他们的尝试却徒劳无功。

languages.text: ヴォイドシップの機械は命令を拒否し、ある機能にアクセスしようとするたびに停止する。オペレーターたちは、自分たちの体がゆがんで見えることに恐怖を感じながら、この現象について少しでも情報を得ようと必死になるが、その試みは徒労に終わる。
languages.original_text: The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップの機械は命令を拒否し、ある機能にアクセスしようとするたびに停止する。オペレーターたちは、自分たちの体がゆがんで見えることに恐怖を感じながら、この現象について少しでも情報を得ようと必死になるが、その試みは徒労に終わる。

languages.text: Las máquinas de la nave del vacío se niegan a cumplir sus órdenes y se apagan cada vez que intentan acceder a una función. Aterrorizados por las centelleantes distorsiones de sus propios cuerpos, los operadores tratan frenéticamente de averiguar al menos alguna información sobre el fenómeno, pero sus intentos son en vano.
languages.original_text: The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

traits.locale_text: Las máquinas de la nave del vacío se niegan a cumplir sus órdenes y se apagan cada vez que intentan acceder a una función. Aterrorizados por las centelleantes distorsiones de sus propios cuerpos, los operadores tratan frenéticamente de averiguar al menos alguna información sobre el fenómeno, pero sus intentos son en vano.

languages.text: Die Maschinen des Raumschiffs weigern sich, ihre Befehle auszuführen. Sie schalten sich ab, sobald man versucht, auf eine Funktion zuzugreifen. Völlig verängstigt von den flackernden Verzerrungen in ihren eigenen Körpern versucht die Crew panisch, zumindest irgendetwas über das Phänomen herauszufinden, aber vergeblich.
languages.original_text: The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

traits.locale_text: Die Maschinen des Raumschiffs weigern sich, ihre Befehle auszuführen. Sie schalten sich ab, sobald man versucht, auf eine Funktion zuzugreifen. Völlig verängstigt von den flackernden Verzerrungen in ihren eigenen Körpern versucht die Crew panisch, zumindest irgendetwas über das Phänomen herauszufinden, aber vergeblich.

languages.text: Les machines du vaisseau refusent d'exécuter les ordres et s'éteignent chaque fois que vos hommes tentent d'accéder à telle ou telle fonction. Terrifiés par les distorsions qui affectent leurs corps, les opérateurs tentent désespérément de grappiller la moindre bribe d'informations sur ce phénomène, mais tous leurs efforts en ce sens restent vains.
languages.original_text: The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.

traits.locale_text: Les machines du vaisseau refusent d'exécuter les ordres et s'éteignent chaque fois que vos hommes tentent d'accéder à telle ou telle fonction. Terrifiés par les distorsions qui affectent leurs corps, les opérateurs tentent désespérément de grappiller la moindre bribe d'informations sur ce phénomène, mais tous leurs efforts en ce sens restent vains.

languages.text: Uçsuz gemisinin makineleri; verilen emirleri yerine getirmeyi reddediyor, işlevlere erişme girişiminde kendilerini kapatıyorlar. Kendi bedenlerindeki titrek bozunumlardan ötürü dehşete düşen operatörler, bu fenomen hakkında az da olsa bilgi edinmek için çaresizce çabalasa da tüm girişimleri sonuçsuz kalıyor.
languages.original_text: The voidship's machines refuse to carry out their orders and shut off in response to every attempt to access a function. Terrified by the flickering distortions in their own bodies, the operators frantically try to find out at least some information about the phenomenon, but their attempts remain in vain.
